Title: Visit "La Plaza de la Constitución"
Description: Take the metro and visit the plaza and the Metropolitan Cathedral of Mexico City.

Title: Visit "El Palacio de Bellas Artes"
Description: After visiting the plaza and the cathedral, walk to this art museum, which is just a couple blocks west from the plaza, and give it a visit.

Title: Visit "El Ángel de la Independencia" and "El Monumento a la Revolución"
Description: Visit these two iconic Mexico City landmarks.

Title: Visit "El Museo Nacional de Antropología"
Description: Visit this museum and take a look at its pre hispanic wonders.

Title: Visit "El Parque Fundidora"
Description: Visit this park and its different museums.

Title: Visit "Chipinque"
Description: Go for a hike at this iconic park.
